title: Manage Private Railcar Storage
description: A customer wants to store their private railcars in the railroad's yard. An agent must process the request and bill for storage.

tasks.description: Receive a request from a customer to store 10 of their railcars.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent understands the customer's needs.

tasks.description: Check for available storage track space in the yard.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent confirms there is enough space.

tasks.description: Create a storage agreement, log the arrival of the cars, and move them to a designated storage track.
tasks.expected_outcome: The cars are received and stored.

tasks.description: The system automatically bills the customer a daily storage fee for each car.
tasks.expected_outcome: Billing for the storage service is initiated.
